definition[0]_en: A type of recording in which the content is stored as continuous variable quantities in or on the media.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A type of recording in which the content is stored as continuous variable quantities in or on the media.

definition[0]_en: A type of recording in which the content is continuously sampled and a sequence of discrete binary values is stored to represent the amplitude of each sample in the waveform.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A type of recording in which the content is continuously sampled and a sequence of discrete binary values is stored to represent the amplitude of each sample in the waveform.
